name: Staff of Stealth
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Magic Items/Staves/Staff of Stealth

Construction.Requirements: Craft Staff, disguise self, greater invisibility, invisibility, nondetection

sections.body:
This twisted, dark gray staff allows use of the following spells:

  • disguise self (1 charge)
  • invisibility (1 charge)
  • nondetection (1 charge)
  • greater invisibility (2 charges)
sections.name: Description
